intro.title: WHO ARE WE?
intro.subtitle: The Standard of Excellence
intro.description: We combine technical mastery with logistical power to bring your vision to life.

0.title: A RELIABLE PARTNER
0.description: We are the technical backbone of the Moroccan audiovisual industry, providing comprehensive solutions from consulting to storage for productions of all scales.

1.title: EXCELLENCE MODEL
1.description: TFS has built its business model around three fundamental values that form the foundation of its corporate culture.

2.title: Innovation
2.description: Every service we deliver is unique. We design specialized solutions with our partners to meet the highest standards.

3.title: Technical Quality
3.description: Guaranteed by the expertise of our teams and the reliability of our equipment, devices, and IT/digital solutions.

4.title: Customer Service
4.description: We guarantee compliance with deadlines thanks to the professionalism of our teams and efficient operational processes.

mainDescription.0: The expertise of our teams, combined with a high-tech equipment fleet, ensures our mastery of the entire audiovisual production chain.
mainDescription.1: Our know-how is now recognized in Morocco, Africa, and the Middle East for major audiovisual events: sports, entertainment, live performances, and TV production.
mainDescription.2: TFS has equipped a TV studio within its facilities that meets the highest requirements in terms of audiovisual equipment and soundproofing.

stat1.title: 21+ YEARS
stat1.description: Leading the industry since 2003 with consistent excellence.

stat2.title: 500+ PROJECTS
stat2.description: Successfully delivered major events across the region.

fact1.title: INTERNATIONAL STANDARDS
fact1.description: Production quality meeting strict global broadcast requirements.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We manage filming from the smallest technical details—down to cables and connections—to full-scale productions, delivering reliable, professional results.

platform.title: Why TFS
platform.subtitle: Morocco's Premier Equipment Rental
platform.description: We provide the highest quality cinema equipment and expert support for film productions, commercials, and content creators in Casablanca and beyond.

logistics.title: Morocco-Wide Delivery
logistics.description: Fast delivery across Morocco. We ensure your gear arrives ready for your shoot, wherever you're filming.

kits.title: Complete Camera Packages
kits.description: Our curated kits include everything you need - cameras, lenses, batteries, and accessories. Ready to roll.

manifest.title: Premium Selection
manifest.description: From RED and ARRI to Sony and Blackmagic - we carry the industry's most trusted cinema cameras and accessories.

quotes.title: Personalized Quotes
quotes.description: Every production is unique. Tell us about your project and we'll create a custom quote tailored to your needs.

support.title: Expert Technical Support
support.description: Our team of film professionals is always available to help you choose the right gear and troubleshoot any issues.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Request a personalized quote for your next production.
